spells.description:
Heals Target for 1d6+1. Damages Undead for 1d6+1.

This orson can also be resversed as Cause Light Wounds, dealing 1d6+1 Damage; requires an attack role versus target.
spells.name: Cure Light Wounds*
Purify Food and Water
spells.description: Purifies spoiled, rotten, poisoned, & otherwise contaminated food & water. Does not prevent spoilage after casting. Spoils Unholy food, water & drinks. Does not affect creatures or magic potions.

spells.name: Remove Fear*
spells.description: Calms Target. If under magical fear, gives new save vs Spells to resist fear at +1/caster level.
spells.reverse: *CAUSE FEAR: Scares 1 Target within 120'. Flees for 2 turns if save vs Spell fails.

spells.name: Resist Cold
spells.description: Grants Target temporary immunity to cold. Target is unaffected by Minor Cold (winter), has a +3 to save throws & 1/2 damage from Significant Cold (ie. Dragon Breath).

spells.name: Charm Animal
spells.description: Makes animals favor caster. Normal & Giant-sized can't save. Must decide which are affected 1st. Fantastics make "Spells" save (If GM allows). Does not give communication. When spell ends, it becomes normal.

spells.name: Find Traps
spells.description: Permits Caster to detect traps (magical & mechanical). Traps within 30' of Caster will give off a faint glow. Does not detect natural traps. Does not give knowledge of disarmament or type/nature.

spells.name: Resist Fire
spells.description: Grants Target temporary immunity to heat & fire. Target is unaffected by Minor heat & fire (normal flames), has a +3 to save throws & 1/2 damage from Significant fire (ie. FIREBALL).

spells.name: Silence 15' Radius
spells.description: Creates absolute silence within a 15' radius around target. Can be cast on spot (stationary), or be cast on moble object of creature (Mobile). Creatures (& thier equipment if targeted) can save vs Spells to negate. No spells can be cast within.

spells.name: Speak with Animals
spells.description: Grants caster understanding & commincation with 1 animal (normal & giant-sized, not magical/monstrous). May change animal once per round. Intelligent animals likely to be terse/evasive. May not alter reaction/attitude of animal.

spells.name: Spiritual Hammer
spells.description: Creates a Warhammer of pure forse to exist & attacks once per round. Deals 1d6+1/caster's 3 levels (Max +5) per strike. It uses caster's attack bonus. It can strike enemies who are only attackable by magic. Hammer disappears if caster loses sight of or ceases to direct it. its Immune to physical attacks.
spells.reverse: Dispeled by DISPEL MAGIC, DISINTEGRATE or ROD OF CANCELLATION.

spells.name: Continual Light*
spells.description: Creates a sphere of light. 30' radius of daylight & less intense to 60'.Can be cast on objects, creatures, & air. If cast on visual organs, target must save vs death ray or suffer -4 on attack rolls.

spells.name: Cure Blindness
spells.description: Cures Blindness caused by injury or magic. Does not cure blindness caused by a curse.

spells.name: Cure Disease*
spells.description: Cures all diseases and kills all parasites that the target is suffering from. Certain special diseases may not be cured by this spell or may be cured only by a caster of a certain level or higher. Can still be reinfected.

spells.name: Growth of Animals
spells.description: Cause animals to grow 2x its size & 8x its weight. It does 2x Dam. & +2 AC. 2x max carrying load. May save vs Spells to resist. Equipment removed from animal remove to norm size. Does not give influence or command.

spells.name: Locate Object
spells.description: Senses direction of a well-known or clearly visualized object. If searched in general terms nearest item is located (if more than one exists in range). Unique items MUST be seen first hand not by divination (ie. CLAIRVOYANCE or CRYSTAL BALL). This sheet of lead/gold blocks. Creatures can't be located by spell.

spells.name: Speak with Dead
spells.description: Grants a corpse ability to speak to caster. Caster can ask 1 question/2 caster levels It can only speak what it knew in life. Answers are often brief, cryptic, & repetitive. If spell was used on corpse within the last week, new spell fails. A damaged corpse must have a mouth & may give only partial answers.

spells.name: Striking
spells.description: Bestows 1 weapon an extra 1d6 damage on a successful attack. It provides no attack bonus. It does allow the weapon to attack monsters who can only be attacked by magic, but the 1d6 damage counts in this instance.

spells.name: Create Water
spells.description: Creates one gallon of water per caster level. Requires vessels to hold water. 1 gallon = 8lbs; 1 cubic foot = 8 gallons.

spells.name: Cure Serious Wounds*
spells.description: Heals Target for 1d6+1/caster level. Damages Undead 1d6+1/caster level.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.description: Ends spells (including potion effects) on a creature or object or 20'cubic area. Spells ≤caster's level canceled. If spells were cast by higher level caster, 5% failure rate per level higher than Caster's level.

spells.name: Neutralize Poison*
spells.description: Cures poison. If cast upon creature slain in last 10 rounds, it revives with 1 HD. If cast on trap, permanently renders poison ineffective.
spells.reverse: *POISON: reverse. Roll attack. Save vs Spell allowed. Touch last 1 round

spells.name: Protection from Evil 10' Radius*
spells.description: Wards against attacks from evil beings, mind control & summoned creates in a 10' radius. All within/entering recieve protection. 1st: Target gains +2 to AC & saves. 2nd: wards from possession & mind control. 3rd: prevents contact of summoned creatures (fails if Target attacks or pushes barrier against creature).
spells.reverse: *PROTECTION FROM GOOD 10' RADIUS: same but from good instead.

spells.name: Speak with Plants
spells.description: Grants caster understanding & commincation with Plants & Plant Creatures. Plants are unable to give details about anything outside of its immediate vicinity but will speak freely. Intelligent plant likely to be terse/evasive. May not alter reaction/attitude of plants.

spells.name: Sticks to Snakes
spells.description: Transforms sticks intointo 1d4 HD worth of snakes (not giant)/4 caster levels. Snakes obey caster. If slain, dispeled or spell expires, they return to sticks. Magical sticks (ie. enchanted staves) are unaffected by spell.
spells.note: See SNAKE in Monster Section for Stats and types

spells.name: Commune
spells.description: Let's caster talk to a deity or extraplanar servant. It answers 1 yes/no question per caster level. (DM decide if it answers clearly or not or if it's omniscient).

spells.name: Create Food
spells.description: Creates bland, highly nourishing food. 3 men or one horse per caster level can be fed for a day. Food is inedible after 24 hours, it can be kept fresh for another 24 hours by casting purify food and water on it

spells.name: Dispel Evil
spells.description: 1st: +4 bonus to AC. 2nd: With attack roll, banish extraplanar being to home plane. Being can save vs Spells. (Spell ends either way) 3rd: dispels spells cast by extraplanar beings.

spells.name: Insect Plague
spells.description: Summons 1 swarm of Locusts/caster level (Max of 6 at level 18). All swarms must be adjacent and are stationary. Attacks anyone in shared or entering.
spells.note: See INSECT SWARM for stats in Monster Section

spells.name: Quest*
spells.description: Forces the Target to carry out a service or refrain from an activity as desird by the Caster. Can't result in self-killing or in ceratin death. Save vs Spells to resist at 1st casting. Target must complete task. Open-ended tasks end in 1 day/Caster level. Disobeying for 24 hours, results 3d6 dam. a day.
spells.note: REMOVE CURSE from caster of 2+ levels of Caster's, WISH, or reverse quest ends

spells.name: Raise Dead*
spells.description: Demi/Human or humanoid who has been dead for 1 day/caster level is given life. Must be willing to return. Target permantly loses a level (min xp for last level). If level 1, loses 1 CON. If CON ≤1 can't be raised. Effects can't be repaired but can still gain xp, levels, & HD in normal fashion. Cures poison/disease.
spells.reverse: *SLAY LIVING: Instant kill. Roll Attack. Save vs Spells. 2d6 dam if saved.
spells.note: Does not affect Undead, Old age death, & elementals/constructs.

spells.name: True Seeing
spells.description: Let's Target see all things as they really are. See through normal & magical darkeness & diguises, detect secret doors, exact locations of creatures & objects, sees past illusions &  true forms of POLYMORPHED, altered, & transmuted things, beings. Target can see truly for 120'. Doesn't give x-ray vision. Fog (& like) blocks.

spells.name: Wall of Fire
spells.description: Creates a fire wall. Deals 2d4 of damage to creatures within 10' & 1d4 dam to any within 20' of the side Caster chooses. Any passing through will take takes 2d6 +1/caster level. Undead take 2x dam. Wall can be straight or cicular and up to 20' high. If invoked on creatures, each saves vs spells for 2d4 dam
spells.reverse: Caster can keep wall indeffintely by focusing or let stand 1 round/level

spells.name: Animate Objects
spells.description: Gives objects life". cannot be used on carried or magical items. Objects have 10' move rate & must have some contact with the ground.Damage is decided by GM.

spells.name: Blade Barrier
spells.description: Wall of whirling blades. 20' long/level or radius of 5'/2 levels. Both are 20' high. Creatures in it must pass "Death Ray" save or suffer 1d6 (Max 15d6) damage. 1/2 damage if saved. If summoned on, save = no damage.
spells.note: It gives cover, +4 bonus to AC

spells.name: Find the Path
spells.description: Target can find shortest, most direct route to a specific physical location. Caster must have knowledge of location. Including described locations. Name is enough. Must be on same plane as caster. Reveals secret doors and solutions.

spells.name: Heal*
spells.description: Heals target of all injury & affliction but -levels & permanent lost ability scores.  Heals all but 1d4 of HD.
spells.reverse: *HARM: reverse; dam. all but 1d4 HD. Must make attack roll.
spells.note: Both reverse for Undead. Does not affect golems.

spells.name: Regenerate
spells.description: Regrows Targets severed body members, broken bones & ruined organs. Takes 1 round for severed members & 1 turn for all others. Also heals 3d8 . Has no affect on nonliving creatures, Undead & constructs.

spells.name: Restoration
spells.description: Removes 1 negative level from Target. At 16th level, removes 2 negative levels. Alternately, restores 1d4 of  Ability points (Temporarily lost) or 1 point (permanently lost).
spells.note: Doesn't remove negative levels given by death.

spells.name: Speak with Monsters
spells.description: Grants caster understanding & commincation with 1 Monster (not undead, mindless monsters, or plants). May change monster once per round. Intelligent monsters likely to be terse/evasive. May not alter reaction/attitude of monster. Speakers of monsters language understand caster.

spells.name: Word of Recall
spells.description: Teleports caster back to his or her sanctuary. Must disignate while preparing & it has to be a very familiar place. Can travel anywhere on the same plane but can't travel between. Caster can bring anyone or anything (max of 300lbs +100/level after 10th). Must be in contact.  save vs Spells to resist.

spells.name: Charm Person
spells.description: Only ≤4 HD Humanoid. Save vs Spells negates. If attacked/threatened, +5 to save. Saves if ordered (GM decides). Must speak language or have good body language. Will protect Caster. Save again by INT score:

spells.name: Detect Magic
spells.description: Let's Caster see a pale glowing light surrounding enchanted or enspelled creatures. Invisible magic is detected as a glowing fog. Caster may attack with -2 penalty. Non-magical invisiblity is not detected. Only Caster can see.

spells.name: Floating Disc
spells.description: Creates circular plane force. Its 3' diameter & 1" deep. Holds 500lbs (62 gallons of water, in container). Stays level with ground & at a height equal to caster's waist. Remains 10' from caster. Can be pushed but dispells if pushed away from caster beyond 10'.

spells.name: Hold Portal
spells.description: Magically holds shut a door, gate, window or shutter of wood, metal, stone. Secures portal like a shut and locked door. KNOCK and DISPEL MAGIC negates.

spells.name: Light*
spells.description: Creates light = to torchlight with 30' radius and 20' dim light around target location/object. Can move if on object. Does not work in Magical Darkness. Can blind if cast in visual organs. Target can save vs Death Ray. Can cancel DARKNESS if caster level is ≥ than spell.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description: Causes a magical missle to dart from caster's finger towards target (must be partially seen) dealing 1d6+1 dam. Never misses. Can't single out specific parts. Inanimated objects not affected. Additional missle/caster level (Max 5). Multiple missle can attack single or group.

spells.name: Magic Mouth
spells.description: Imbues object (includes trees/rocks) with a mouth that appears sudden and gives message. 3 words/caster level & in any language the caster knows at any volume for 10 min when triggered. Caster can set visual/audio triggers (as complex as desired) but they can be fooled. Trigger range is 10'/caster level.

spells.name: Protection from Evil*
spells.description: Wards against attacks from evil beings, mind control & summoned creates in a 1' radius. 1st: Target gains +2 to AC & saves. 2nd: wards from possession & mind control. 3rd: prevents contact of summoned creatures (fails if Target attacks or pushes barrier against creature).
spells.reverse: *PROTECTION FROM GOOD: same but from good instead.

spells.name: Read Languages
spells.description: Gives ability to rad any written language. Cast 1 of 3 modes. 1st: Read any # of works in variety of languages for 1 turn/caster level. 2nd: Read any book/tome  for 3 hours/caster level. 3rd: Read any 1 single scroll or 1 sheet document. Doesn't work on magic text or grant understanding.
spells.note: Requires a creature who can read Language must exist on the plane.

spells.name: Read Magic
spells.description: Enables caster to read megical text. ALL Magic-USERs begin adepted in this spell. It can be cast without a spellbook. If cast on a cursed text, it will trigger the curse.

spells.name: Shield
spells.description: Creates an invisible, shield-like mobile force in front of caster. Negates MAGIC MISSILES from all directions. +3 vs Melee & +6 vs Missles to AC, except from attacks from behind caster.

spells.name: Sleep
spells.description: Puts several creatures ≤3 HD asleep. Those of ≥4 HD are unaffected, as are undead, constructs, and unconscious. Slapping & attacking wakes up.

spells.name: Ventriloquism
spells.description: Caster can cause his/her voice to sound from someplace else within range.

spells.name: Detect Evil*
spells.description: Let's caster see evil in Creatures, magic items, & (possibly) extraplanar beings as a glow. No one else sees this glow.

spells.name: Detect Invisible
spells.description: Let's Caster see invisible characters, creatures or objects within the given range, seeing them as translucent shapes. [like Pepper's Ghost]

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.description: Target becomes invisible (including to Darkvision). Target is invisible to eveyone. can still be heard anything on Target is unseen except if droped or extending >10'. Last 24 hours. Ends if target attacks or cast spells but not if defending.

spells.name: Knock
spells.description: Opens stuck, barred, locked HELD & WIZARD LOCKED doors. Includes secret doors, trick opening boxes/chests. Lossens welds, shackles, chains. Suspends (not remove) WIZARD LOCKS for 1 turn. Can't raise portcullis or similar mechanism. Each spell undos a single means preventing access.

spells.name: Levitate
spells.description: Leviates Target up/down 20'/round as desired by caster. Must be wiling to accept spell or be unettended (if single object). Can't move sideways unless pushing on a surface (1/2 speed if so). If attacking has penality -1 for 1st attack and increasing to -5. 1 round stablizing resets to -1.

spells.name: Mirror Image
spells.description: Causes 1d4+1/caster's 3 levels (max 8) of illusory copies of caster. They move constantly through each other and the caster, mimicing him or her. Attacks will always hit a copy first. AOE spells affect all copies as it does the caster. Direct spells at the copy destroy it without save.

spells.name: Phantasmal Force
spells.description: Creates VISUAL illusion of object, creature(s) or effects as conceived by caster in area (Max 20'x20'x20'). If 1+ creatures created, they have 11 AC. Damage is not real but simulates normal Dam. Anyone "killed" by the illusions, wake up after 2d8 rounds. Animating beyond limit will allow Save vs Spells.
spells.note: Those who save see through spell.

spells.name: Web
spells.description: Creates 8,000 cubic feet of webs. Like spider web but bigger and tougher. Traps anyone in or entering the webs, save vs Death Ray. Success: 1/2 move rate, can't attack or cast spells. Fail, Unable to do aything. Creatures with STR ≥13 new get save each round. webs can burn 10' cube/round. 2d4 dam if in.

spells.name: Wizard Lock
spells.description: Magically seals a door, chest, or portal. The caster can pass through freely, as well as any Magic User who is ≥3 levels higher than the one who casts the spell. Anyone ele has to break in or cast DISPEL MAGIC or KNOCK.

spells.name: Clairvoyance
spells.description: Caster looks through creature's eyes. Must specify direction & ~distance. Max 60'. Spell fails if no creature is there. May choose another afte 1 turn. May choose another if lost contact or out of range. It remains unaware

spells.name: Darkvision
spells.description: The target receives Darkvision with a range of 60' for the duration of the spell.

spells.name: ESP
spells.description: Let's Caster "Hear" surface thoughts. Must Designate direction & focus for a turn. May change direction each Turn. May stop & resume if not expired. Target may not be aware. Undead and Mindless immune. 2" Rock & Heavy Metal Blocks spell.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: Deals 1d6/ Caster level with a 20' sphere. Save vs Spells for 1/2 dam. Must determine distance height. If shot through narrow space, must roll missle attack (no range adjustments). Early impact = early detonation. Damages objects in area. Melts low melting-point metals. Can breakthrough barriers.

spells.name: Fly
spells.description: Target can fly at normal move rate (adjust for encumbrance). Ascends at 1/2 speed. Descends at 2x speed. Can still cast or attack. Can't charge/run or carry >max weight. If the spell expires/dispels, Target flots down 120'/1d10 rounds.

spells.name: Haste*
spells.description: 2x speed of move & action rate of 1 target/caster level.Spell casting and magical item use not 2x. Does not stack.
spells.reverse: *SLOW: same but at 1/2 speed. Target can Save vs Spells to avoid.

spells.name: Hold Person
spells.description: Paralyzes demi/human or humanoid. Creatures >ogre and undead not affected. Save vs Spell to negate. Shingle target has -2 save. 1d4 of creatures can be affected. Flyers fall & swimmers may drown.

spells.name: Invisibility 10' Radius
spells.description: All Targets within 10' of recipient becomes invisible (including to Darkvision). Everyone can see each other within range. Can still be heard anything on Targets are unseen except if droped or extending >10'of range. Last 24 hours. Ends for targets (only) attacks or cast spells but not if defending.
spells.note: Ends for all if Caster casts or attacks

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.description: Deals 1d6 damage/caster level within range. Save vs Spells for 1/2 dam. Begins at casters finger and extends to given range (minimum 60'). Passes through area at 5' wide. Sets combustables on fire, Melts low melting ponit metals. Can bust through barriers or be reflected randomly. Affected targets do not take extra dam.

spells.name: Protection from Normal Missiles
spells.description: Protects Caster from non-magical missles (arrows, bullets, bolts, thrown weapons). Does not protect from Magical arrows, hurled boulder & etc. Non-magical missles from magical weapons are considered magical.

spells.name: Water Breathing
spells.description: Allows Targets to breathe water freely. Divide the duration evenly among all the Targets the caster touches. Targets can still breathe air.

spells.name: Charm Monster
spells.description: 3d6 of ≤3 HD or 1 of ≥3 HD. Save vs Spells negates. If attacked/threatened, +5 to save. Saves if ordered (GM decides). Must speak language or have good body language. Will protect Caster. Save again by INT score:

spells.name: Confusion
spells.description: Confuses 3d6 creatures in 30' radius. It "Save vs Spells" to resist. On its intiative roll 1d20: 1-2 Attacks, 3-4 Normal, 5-10 Babbles, 11-14 Flees, 15-20 attacks other creature. If unable to perform it babbles.

spells.name: Dimension Door
spells.description: Tranfers him/herself or a single target within range to any spot 200' +20/caster level. They arrive at exactly the desired spot. Another creature or characte can be transported if first is able to hold.
spells.note: Fails if spot is in solid wall

spells.name: Growth of Plants*
spells.description: Overgrows up to 1,000' sq./5 caster levels of normal vegitation. Reduces >giant-size to 5' round move rate. Giant-size is rduced to 1/2 move rate. Does not affect animated plants. DISPEL MAGIC and SHRINK PLANT ends spell.

spells.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
spells.description: Changes appearance of outdoor terrain 10 cubic yards/level. Does not change/hide structures, equipment, & creature. Requires full turn to cast. Save vs Spells to see through the illusion, if actively attempted.

spells.name: Ice Storm
spells.description: Rains down Magical hailstones for 1 round. Deals 5d6 damage to everyone in a 20' radius target spot. Save vs Spells for 1/2 Dam. Fills 40' vertical column. Higher creatues are unaffected. -20% penalty to "Listen" roll. All move at 1/2 speed. Cold resistance gives 1/2 dam. (1/4 dam. is save successful).

spells.name: Massmorph
spells.description: Causes 1d4+1/caster level of ≤Man-sized creatues to blend into natural terrain. Desired Targets must be with 120' radius of caster & must be willing. If a Target move/attack spell dispels for him/her. Caster can end spell early. DISPEL MAGIC ends spell.

spells.name: Polymorph Other
spells.description: Changes 1 Target into another form of living being. The form can't have >HD than caster, be gasuos or incorporeal. Target acquires ALL traits, abilities, powers & stats of new form (keep old HD). If form's INT is < Target old self s/he may not remener past Life. Shapeshifting Form can revert to old self in 1 round.

spells.name: Polymorph Self
spells.description: Changes caster into another form of a living creature. Can't assume incorporeal or gaseous form. If slain, return to old form. Keep original mental ability. Gain new form's physical ability. Do not gain special, supernatural, or spell abilities.

spells.name: Remove Curse*
spells.description: Removes curse from creature or object. Doesn't get rid of weapon, shield & armor curses but allows them to be taken off & get rid of it. Some curses are unremovable or can only be removed by higher caster levels.

spells.name: Wizard Eye
spells.description: Creates invisible Magic "eye". It has Darkvision and lets caster see 240' away. It can move 40'/round but will not move 240' away from caster. It can't pass through solid objects but can fit through 1" round holes.  Caster must focus to use eye.

spells.name: Animate Dead
spells.description: Turns dead into undead skeletons & zombies. Stays until destroyed. Skeletons HD = dead creatures HD. Zombies HD = dead creatures HD+1. Requires mostly intact remains. Caster controls Spell level x2 of undead.

spells.name: Cloudkill
spells.description: Creates a 20'x20'x20' poison gas cloud. Moves 10'/round if caster concentrates. Kills anything with ≤3 of HD/level. ≥4 HD/level must "save vs Poison" or die.

spells.name: Conjure Elemental
spells.description: Summons Elemantal from its Plane. 1 of each element can be summoned a day. It serves until caster loses concetration or dispeled by caster. If lost, will rampage & only "Dispel Magic/Evil" will banish.

spells.name: Feeblemind
spells.description: If Target fails save vs Spells, its INT and CHA drop to 1. It's unable to cat spells, understand language,  or communicate. It remembers friends and eill protect them. It remains in such state until a "HEAL" spell is used. A MU has a -4 penalty to its save.

spells.name: Hold Monster
spells.description: Paralyzes any living creature. Creatures >ogre and undead not affected. Save vs Spell to negate. Shingle target has -2 save. 1d4 of creatures can be affected. Flyers fall & swimmers may drown.

spells.name: Magic Jar
spells.description: Places Caster's soul into a gem/large crystal within range (no need to be seen), allowing possession of nearby creature. PROTECTION FROM EVIL blocks. Save vs Spells to resist. If success, keep Caster's INT, WIS, WIS & Host's STR, CON, DEX. Can't reposses body until expired. DISPEL MAGIC/EVIL ends spell.
spells.reverse: Caster soul dies if boy isn't in range when gem is broken
spells.note: Host spirit dies if not near body.

spells.name: Passwall
spells.description: Creates passage through wood, plaste & stone walls but not metal. Passage is 10'+10'/3 caster levels. If passage is short than wall it stops abruptly. More than 1 can be used to extend. If spell ends (duration, choice, DISPEL MAGIC) it ejects all out of the nearest exit.

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.description: Permits caster to move objects or creature by concentration alone. Can move Max of 50lbs/caster level to max of 20'/round. Creature can Save vs Death Ray to negate effect. Must concentrate to use: no running,casting, or attacking. Can reuse power next round if focus lost but Target gets new save if so.

spells.name: Teleport
spells.description: Instantly transports Caster to designated destination. Which can be 100 miles/caster level away. Caster can bring objects/creatures (Max 300lbs +100lbs/level above 10th). Must be in physical contact to be brought along. Creatures can save vs Spells to resist. Magical areas make teleportation more difficult.

spells.name: Wall of Stone
spells.description: Creates 1" thick stone wall up to 10'x10'/caster level. Can't be conjured on top of creatures objects (but can trap if they are mobile, save vs Death Ray allowed). Can be shaped to be bridge/ramp, if spaning 20' must be arched (=1/2 area). DISINTEGRATE destroys as does chipping.
spells.reverse: Wall can be shaped at a 2:1 ratio

spells.name: Anti-Magic Shell
spells.description: Within a 10' radius around the caster, all magic is negated for the full duration of the spell.  Magical attacks will not affect the caster, magic items and spells within the radius are suppressed.
spells.note: Spells can't be cast until expired.

spells.name: Death Spell
spells.description: Kills 3d12 HD or levels of creatures in a 30' radius. Excess levels are ineffective. It must save vs Death Ray. ≥8 HD or Levels are immune. Does not affect Undead, golems, or anything not truly alive.

spells.name: Disintegrate
spells.description: A thin, green ray shoots from caster's finger. A single creature or object (10'x10'x10' cubic material) is turned into fine dust. Targets equipment is unaffected. Target saves vs Spells. If saved spell is wasted.

spells.name: Flesh to Stone*
spells.description: Turns Target & its gear to stone. Save vs Petrification to resist. Damage to statue stays with target (if returned to original state). Only affects flesh beings.
spells.reverse: STONE TO FLESH: reverses this spell.

spells.name: Geas*
spells.description: Target obeys Caster's command. Save vs Spells to resist (at casting). Does not expire except if task is open ended (last a day/caster level). If target disobeys it recieves -2  to all ability scores (max -8), can't reduce >3. Penalty removed after 24 of obidence. Can't kill self. REMOVE CURSE, WISH & REMOVE GEAS dispels.

spells.name: Invisible Stalker
spells.description: Summons INVISIBLE STALKER to do caster's bidding. persist until DISPEL MAGIC is cast on ctreature, it is slain, or task is forfiled.
spells.note: See INVISIBLE STALKER for stats in "Monster Section"

spells.name: Lower Water
spells.description: Causes water (or similar liquid) to reduce 2'/caster level to min of 1". Lowers within square deression with sides of 10'/caster level. In large water bodies, creates whirlpool that traps nearby ships'. If cast on Water Elementals, reduces speed move and attack rate to 1/2. Save vs Spell to negate.

spells.name: Projected Image
spells.description: Creates qausi-real image of caster. It looks, sounds, smells like caster and mimics actions, speech included. Spells seem to come from image but range is from caster. Desn't give sensory feedback. Lost of line of sight, including by spells, ends.

spells.name: Reincarnate
spells.description: Brings back a dead Humanoid (includes PC) into a new body.  soul must be willing to return. Roll d%: 1-2= bugbear, 3-17= dwarf, 18-28= elf, 29= gnoll, 30-39= gnome, 40-44= goblin, 45-63= halfling, 64-88= human, 89-92= kobold, 93= lizard man, 94-98= orc, 99= troglodyte. 100=GM choice. Memories remain intact.
spells.reverse: Lose level; -2 CON (if 1st) reroll STR, DEX, CON. -1 HD roll

spells.name: Wall of Iron
spells.description: Creates 1" thick iron wall up to 10'x10'/caster level. Can't be conjured on creatures or objects or in air. Must be on flat plane. Can be shaped to fit space. If unattached, 50% to fall unless pushed by creature with 13 STR (≥4 HD). If it falls, creatures save vs Death Ray +Dex bonus. 10d6 dam if fail. ≥Ogre-size immune
spells.reverse: Wall can be shaped at a 2:1 ratio

monsters.name: Chimera
monsters.special: The dragon head is either black, blue, green, red, or white (and the breath weapon with the same) effecting a cone a 50' long cone with a 10' wide end for 3d6 points of damage (save vs. Dragon Breath for half damage).

monsters.name: Sea Dragon

monsters.name: White Dragon

May make 1 attack or a gust against all opponents in a 5' radius: creatures of 2 hit dice or less must save vs. Death Ray or fall prone. Creatures of 3 or more levels or hit dice are not affected.
